name: ProGuide-Terraria edition
description:
***** ULTIMATE GUIDES & CHEATS FOR Terraria + QUIZ + VIDEOS + LOT MORE *****
*** Bonus HUGE long quiz/trivia with large number of questions! ***

Walkthroughs, items, maps, video tips, strategies to beat your friends and more...

+ Game center integrated
+ Learn everything about monsters, NPC's, hardmode monsters and events, armor and weapons!
+ Easiliy see what you need for crafting specific item!
+ Videos- boss fights, epic moments in the game
+ Compete with your friends in Quiz game, can they beat your score?
+ Scoreboard-can you be no1 in the world?

* Works on iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad - iOS 4.3 and higher
